type.name: Time
type.description: Change in the simulation system time and the duration of the new time step

field.name: startday
field.description: Day number of the start of the timestep

field.name: startsec
field.description: Seconds past midnight of the start of the timestep (0-86399)

field.name: startsecpart
field.description: Fraction of a second of the start of the timestep (0-1)

field.name: endday
field.description: Day number of the end of the timestep

field.name: endsec
field.description: Seconds past midnight of the end of the timestep (0-86399)

field.name: endsecpart
field.description: Fraction of a second of the end of the timestep (0-1)

field.name: Sender
field.descr: name of module raising the event

field.name: AnimalType
field.descr: animal type

field.name: Urinations
field.descr: number of urine depositions

field.name: VolumePerUrination
field.descr: volume of each urine deposition

field.name: UreaNPerUrination
field.descr: amount of urea in each urine deposition

field.name: POXPerUrination
field.descr: amount of POx in each urine deposition

field.name: SO4PerUrination
field.descr: amount of SO4 in each urine deposition

field.name: AshAlkPerUrination
field.descr: ash amount in each urine deposition

field.name: Sender
field.descr: name of module raising the event

field.name: AnimalType
field.descr: animal type

field.name: Defaecations
field.descr: number of faeces depositions

field.name: VolumePerDefaecation
field.descr: volume of each faeces deposition

field.name: OMWeight
field.descr: dry weight of each faeces deposition

field.name: OMMoist
field.descr: moisture of each faeces deposition

field.name: OMN
field.descr: org N content of each faeces deposition

field.name: OMP
field.descr: org P content of each faeces deposition

field.name: OMS
field.descr: org S content of each faeces deposition

field.name: OMAshAlk
field.descr: org ash content of each faeces deposition

field.name: NO3N
field.descr: NO3 content of each faeces deposition

field.name: NH4N
field.descr: NH4 content of each faeces deposition

field.name: POXP
field.descr: POx content of each faeces deposition

field.name: SO4S
field.descr: SO4 content of each faeces deposition

field.name: Sender
field.descr: name of module raising the event

field.name: StockType
field.descr: animal type

field.name: StockDensity
field.descr: stocking density

field.name: UrineNLoad
field.descr: amount of N being applied

field.name: UrineWater
field.descr: amount of water being applied

field.name: InfiltrationShapeType
field.descr: shape for urine infiltration

field.name: MaxInfiltrationDepth
field.descr: max urine infiltration in the soil

field.name: Sender
field.descr: name of module raising the event

field.name: AffectedPatches_nm
field.descr: the name of patches affected by new patch

field.name: AffectedPatches_id
field.descr: the id of patches affected by new patch

field.name: AreaFraction
field.descr: relative area (fraction) of new patches

field.name: PatchName
field.descr: base name of new patches

field.name: Water
field.descr: amount of water to add per layer

field.name: Urea
field.descr: amount of urea to add per layer

field.name: NH4
field.descr: amount of ammonium to add per layer

field.name: NO3
field.descr: amount of nitrate to add per layer

field.name: POX
field.descr: amount of POx to add per layer

field.name: SO4
field.descr: amount of SO4 to add per layer

field.name: AshAlk
field.descr: ash amount to add per layer

field.name: FOM_C
field.descr: amount of carbon to add as FOM per layer

field.name: FOM_C_pool1
field.descr: amount of carbon in pool1 to add per layer

field.name: FOM_C_pool2
field.descr: amount of carbon in pool2 to add per layer

field.name: FOM_C_pool3
field.descr: amount of carbon in pool3 to add per layer

field.name: FOM_N
field.descr: amount of nitrogen to add as FOM per layer

field.name: Sender
field.descr: name of module raising the event

field.name: AffectedPatches_nm
field.descr: the name of patches that will be merged

field.name: AffectedPatches_id
field.descr: the id of patches that will be merged

field.name: MergeAll
field.descr: define whether all patches will be merged

field.name: Sender
field.descr: name of module raising the event

field.name: SoluteName
field.descr: name of solute being changed

field.name: SoluteUnits
field.descr: units of values being changed

field.name: DeltaSolute
field.descr: amount of solute changed, by layer
